title: No champions should have access to %damage reduction except for tanks and MAYBE juggernauts
body: Squishy mobile carries should not have access to them at all because shit like the current patch happens

There are different reasons for a champion to require a VGU.
And Dr. Mundo is definitely in need of one.

1. Visuals: His model is probably the worst in the whole game. He doesn't fit in, he looks more like a comic character than an actual champion in the league of legends.
2. Matching lore and gameplay fantasy: There is way more potential coming from his lore to make something great out of Mundo.
3. Outdated kit: You may think otherwise, but I play him as well and think that he definitely needs a new kit. There is almost no skill expression in his current one, he just has one skillshot with his Q and the rest is a bunch of passive effects you can trigger on demand. His passive is basically just more health regen than other characters. He lacks tools to make plays. Right now he can just poke you down with Q and then run you over. And he gets countered way too hard with grevious wounds.
I don't want Riot to ruin my champion like they already ruined quite a few

And honestly, I can't wait for it. Dr. Mundo just has great potential with his lore. I want his kit to live up to that.

I agree that carries with general %dmg reduction can be overbearing.

However, your statement is false. %dmg reduction can be a very precious tool to craft divers and fighter kits. WW's E, for example, gives him a sizeable amount of tankyness, but in a telegraphed, temporary and conditional way (if you use your fear, you lose your defensive steroid). I would look at a champion kit and role and then judge if the %dmg reduction is justified or not.

The _last_ thing AD Assassins and ADCs need are a Stasis effect.
And AP assassins and burst mages need something that lets them wait for CD's while you can do nothing?

ADs have auto attacks that actually do something. They also often have cooldowns much lower than APs.

Ex: Zed's cooldowns at max rank, no CDR, are 6/14/3/80. Lux's are 11/10/10/50.

Do you really think Zed should be able to go in, blow up his target, Stasis, then blink back out? It'd be like before Fizz E was nerfed so he could E, Zhonya's, E.
An AA from a Vayne does much less than a Q from {{champion:45}}

At a much faster rate than Veigar Q. 

At 40% CDR, Veigar Q has a 3s CD. I wouldn't doubt Vayne gets up to 1.5 AS, so I'm going to use that as an easy number. Vayne gets 4.5 AAs in the time of 1 Veigar Q.
Which you have an easy time setting up to counter, same as with Zhonyas.

Sure, if it's a bad scenario to use the Stasis. But if you use your Stasis _properly_, they don't get to counter it.

http://i.imgur.com/W6g4qGU.jpg?noredirect

Using your Stasis against an enemy Zed in the middle of a team fight, so he can be properly focused and you avoid his combo. Hard to punish someone in the back line.


http://i.imgur.com/k6XtgkH.jpg?noredirect

Using your Stasis against an enemy Zed while you're alone, as he will promptly kill you after your Stasis.
Even in team fights it's possible to get burst after a good set up.
